Ryan Fraser leaves the club after playing an important role in the Cherries' journey to the Premier League.

After joining the club from Aberdeen in January 2013, the Scotland international went on to make over 200 appearances and last season was second in the Premier League assists chart, behind only Chelsea's Eden Hazard.

Jordon Ibe's four years with the Cherries come to a close following 92 appearances and five goals, including the winner in January 2018 as the side secured their first ever success over Arsenal.
